definitions.definition: A weight that is put in opposition to an equal weight so it keeps that in balance.
A force or influence that balances, checks or limits an opposite one.
To apply weight in order to balance an opposing weight.
definitions.example: Big brother counterbalances his two siblings to the pound.

definitions.definition: To match or equal in effect when applying opposing force
definitions.example: Arm wrestling is undecided as long as the opponents counterbalance each-other
